scripts.build: bun build ./index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm --external argon2 --external mysql2 --external better-sqlite3 --external postgres --external @aws-sdk/client-s3 && bun run build:types
scripts.build:watch: bun build ./index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm --external argon2 --external mysql2 --external better-sqlite3 --external postgres --external @aws-sdk/client-s3 --watch
scripts.test:unit: bun run lint:actions && bun run build && bun test --coverage --max-concurrency=1 $(find ./src -name "*.unit.test.ts" -print)
scripts.test:integration: bun run lint:actions && bun run build && bun test "src/testing/integration.test.ts"
scripts.test:hostile: bun run lint:actions && bun run build && bun test "src/testing/hostile.test.ts"
